thread.title: Adrian Weckler on LA riots lockdown: This is the curfew zone - and tensions are running high

author: Adrian Weckler
title: Adrian Weckler on LA riots lockdown: This is the curfew zone - and tensions are running high
text:
Adrian Weckler on LA riots lockdown: This is the curfew zone – and tensions are running high
As Los Angeles endures its second night of a lockdown curfew, Adrian Weckler reports from inside the curfew zone
Within a few minutes of entering the city’s downtown, I saw them. A group of around 100 protesters were shouting from a bridge, with flags and banners. A block away, I could see the blue and red lights of half a dozen police cars approaching, in formation. Overhead, a helicopter suddenly became audible.
Welcome to Los Angeles after curfew.
Join the Irish Independent WhatsApp channel
